Vasudev Ram ( www.dancingbison.com ) is an independent software developer, writer, consultant and trainer. He has many years of experience with different programming languages and various software tools and technologies.
<<BR>>
Vasudev is the creator of the open source xtopdf project - see http://www.dancingbison.com/products.html and http://sourceforge.net/projects/xtopdf . xtopdf is a toolkit for creating PDF output from input formats like text, CSV, DBF, TDV and XLS. See http://www.packtpub.com/article/Using_xtopdf for details.
